sentences.en: After testing, this vaccine could be used to immunize individuals at high risk for SARS exposure.
sentences.cn: 经过测试, 这种疫苗可用来免疫与SARS病毒接触的高危人群.

sentences.en: But his thirties, had widely to immunize children against vaccinia vaccine to reduce transmission of smallpox.
sentences.cn: 但他在三十年代, 己广为儿童接种牛痘疫苗,减少了天花的传染.

sentences.en: Drinking regularly can improve physical quality and enhance ability to immunize.
sentences.cn: 经常饮用牛奶能提高人的身体素质,增强人体的免疫能力.

sentences.en: Keeping records will do the same for you - it will immunize you against impulsive gambling.
sentences.cn: 做交易记录也是这样 —— 它能防止你做冲动交易.

sentences.en: This gas mask can immunize you against poison gas.
sentences.cn: 防毒面具能使你免遭毒气袭击.

sentences.en: Using highly pure C - reactive protein ( CRP ) to immunize rabbits, a high titer anti - CRP anti - serum was obtained.
sentences.cn: 采用高纯度的C反应蛋白 ( crp ) 免疫兔, 获取高效价的 crp 抗体.

sentences.en: We should require that every student is immunized against hepatitis B.
sentences.cn: 我们应该要求每一位学生都注射乙肝疫苗。

words.tran_cn: [免疫] 免疫荧光；萤光免疫检验法
使免疫（immunize的过去式、过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 使免疫, 赋予免疫性, 使成为无害
trans.tran_en: to protect someone from a particular illness by giving them a vaccine
